titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. Ellis Leighton Kt. at the Tholsell of Dublin, April the 4th 1672
titleStmt.author: Leighton, Elisha, Sir, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King's most excellent majesty,
